sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The standard of the Lord revealed he hath led and guided and preserved his people since Adam to this day ... : as also a clear manifestation by the Scriptures of the recovering and redeeming his spiritual seed and body, which is his church ... / given forth at Lancaster Castle 11 month 1665/6 by M.F. a prisoner of the Lord. Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
[6], 130, [2] p.
Printed at London and re-printed at Edinburgh, [Edinburgh] : 1691.
Signed at end: Margaret Fell. Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
[6], 130, [2] p.
Printed at London and re-printed at Edinburgh, [Edinburgh] : 1691.
